overview: Fabi is gay an that's fine. Whereas Benni says that the long nights together with Fabi are nothing else than the product of to much beer. Fabi is going to a party with Benni against his better know and it comes to a violent argument with Benni's friend Maik about Fabi's homosexuality. Benni has to make his choice between keeping his secret or defending Fabi against Maik.
title: Jain
